name: sunith vs

top_projects.name: auto-pr
top_projects.description: Transform your commit messages into perfectly formatted Pull Requests automatically! This GitHub Action eliminates manual PR creation by parsing commit messages for branch targets and ticket IDs, perfect for developers who believe in automating repetitive tasks.

top_projects.name: devb.io
top_projects.description: DevB.io seamlessly transforms your GitHub footprint into a living, breathing portfolio. Powered by AI, it tells your developer story while you focus on what matters most: writing great code. No more portfolio maintenance headaches, just pure coding brilliance on display.

top_projects.name: marine-science
top_projects.description: A Django-based web application for managing marine science conference registrations, abstract submissions, and payments. The system provides a complete solution for conference organization, including user authentication, payment processing, and content management.

top_projects.name: RideBook
top_projects.description: A Django-based ride-sharing platform API that implements core functionalities similar to Uber. This project provides a robust backend system for managing ride bookings, user authentication, and real-time ride tracking.

top_projects.name: youtube-video-summarisation
top_projects.description: A Django web application that generates concise summaries of YouTube videos using Natural Language Processing (NLP). The application extracts the transcript from YouTube videos and creates a summary highlighting the key points.

sunithvs/event-checkin.summary: The event-checkin repository has experienced a series of push events with 'init' messages, indicating initialization activities, over the past week, with a notable cluster of pushes on January 9 and 11, suggesting significant setup and configuration efforts.

sunithvs/polls.summary: Recent activities in the polls repository have been focused on establishing a functional base, with multiple push events on January 8, including the addition of some animations, demonstrating progress towards a working foundation for the project.

sunithvs/poll-flow.summary: The poll-flow repository has seen updates such as the implementation of private polls and a merge from the remote main branch on January 13, along with earlier changes like a title update and a README modification, indicating ongoing development and refinement.

sunithvs/sunithvs.summary: The sunithvs repository had a recent push event on January 13, where the websync.yml file was updated, suggesting maintenance or configuration adjustments to the repository.

sunithvs/devb.io.summary: A significant pull request was submitted to the devb.io repository on January 12, focusing on fixing the persistence of link icons and swapping to lucid icons on hover, which aims to enhance user experience through improved navigation and visual consistency.

profile_summary: As a seasoned backend developer with a strong foundation in Python, C, and TypeScript, I leverage my technical expertise to build innovative solutions. With a professional network of over 100 followers and a portfolio of 100+ public repositories, I've established myself as a credible presence in the development community. I'm currently working at Eduport, where I apply my skills to drive projects forward, and I'm excited to collaborate with like-minded professionals through my work, which can be explored further at devb.io/sunithvs.
